func BenchmarkMemoryStack(b *testing.B) {
    var s S
    b.ResetTimer()
    for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ {
        s = byCopy()
    }
    b.StopTimer()
    _ = fmt.Sprintf("%v", s.a)
}

func BenchmarkMemoryHeap(b *testing.B) {
    var s *S
    b.ResetTimer()
    for i := 0; i < b.N; i++ {
        s = byPointer()
    }
    b.StopTimer()
    _ = fmt.Sprintf("%v", s.a)
}
